mapper.insert: insert into funding values(seq_funding.nextval, #{creatorNum}, #{fundingCate}, #{fundingTitle}, #{fundingCount}, #{fundingStart}, #{fundingEnd}, default, #{targetMoney}, default, sysdate, default, default, #{creatorNickname}, #{fundingContent}, #{fundingSummary})
insert into image values(seq_image.nextval, #{imageForm}, #{originName}, #{imageRename}, #{imageSrc}, default, default, #{imageLevel}, 1, seq_funding.currval)
mapper.select: select * from funding where funding_status='Y' order by funding_num desc
select * from image where image_board_cate=1 and image_status='Y' and image_level=0

choose.when: select * from funding where funding_title like '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

mapper.insert: insert into funding_notice values(seq_funding_notice.nextval, #{fundingNum}, #{fundingNoticeWriter}, #{fundingNoticeTitle}, #{fundingNoticeContent}, default, default, default, default, #{fundingNoticeCategory})
insert into reward values(seq_reward.nextval, seq_funding.currval, #{rewardTitle}, #{rewardContent}, #{price}, #{shipping}, #{rewardLimit}, default, #{rewardExpectDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from review where reviewer = #{reviewer} and funding_num = #{fundingNum}
mapper.insert: insert into funding_edit values(seq_funding_edit.nextval, #{fundingTitle}, #{fundingContent}, #{fundingNum}, default, sysdate, default)
mapper.select: select * from review where funding_num=#{fundingNum} order by review_num desc
select count(*) from review where funding_num=#{fundingNum} order by review_num desc
select * from funding order by funding_count desc
select * from funding where funding_end < sysdate order by funding_num desc
select * from funding where funding_end < sysdate order by funding_count desc
select * from funding join creator using(creator_num) where creator = #{id} order by create_date desc

select funding_num, creator_num, funding_cate, funding_title, funding_count, funding_start, funding_end, current_money, target_money, confirm, create_date, modify_date, funding_status, creator_name, funding_summary, (current_money / target_money) percent from funding where funding_status='Y' order by percent desc

choose.when: select * from funding where funding_status = 'Y' order by funding_start asc

select e.funding_num, e.creator_num, e.funding_cate, e.funding_title, e.funding_count, e.funding_start, e.funding_end, e.current_money, e.target_money, e.confirm, e.create_date, e.modify_date, e.funding_status, e.creator_name, funding_summary from funding e full join dibs d on(e.funding_num = d.funding_num) group by e.funding_num, e.creator_num, e.funding_cate, e.funding_title, e.funding_count, e.funding_start, e.funding_end, e.current_money, e.target_money, e.confirm, e.create_date, e.modify_date, e.funding_status, e.creator_name, e.funding_summary having funding_status = 'Y' order by count(dibs_id) desc

mapper.select: select * from funding where funding_status = 'Y' and funding_cate = #{cate}
select * from funding join creator using(creator_num) where creator = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into funding_message values(seq_funding_message.nextval, #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{fundingNum}, #{messageTitle}, #{messageContent}, #{messageCate}, sysdate, default, null, sysdate, default)
mapper.select: select * from creator where creator_num = #{creatorNum}
select * from funding where creator_num = #{creatorNum}
select * from review where creator_num = #{creatorNum}
select count(*) from alarm where member_id = #{memberId} and alarm_board_cate = 1 and alarm_board_id = #{alarmBoardId}
select * from payschedule where funding_num=#{fundingNum} order by CUSTOMER_UID desc
select * from image where image_board_cate=3 and image_board_id=#{memberId} and image_status='Y'
mapper.delete: delete from follow where creator_num=#{creatorNum} and follower=#{follower}
